store_info.title: RBLPay
store_info.description:
RBLPay is an accredited and one stop UPI-based application which can serve your payment needs, in a safe & secure manner. With RBLPay application customer can link his/her any bank account(s) over UPI and make instant bank to bank transfers on VPA as well as account number & IFSC Code without any hassle to remember account details of the beneficiary. Customer shall be able to Pay and initiated collect money requests to their VPAs. Virtual Payment Address (VPA) is an abstract form to represent and identify the account details, and account details remain confidential. By adding accounts of different banks, customer can manage the account in single platform.

A customer can also decide to use the mobile number as the VPA id instead of the short name for the virtual address like 1234567890@rbl. Now you can complete the Mobile Banking Registration of Banks Participating in UPI without downloading Mobile Banking Application or Visiting to the Banks Branch.

Following are featured provided in RBLPay App -

o User Signup / Profile Creation
o Bank accounts addition
o Default Payment address creation
o Automatic Mobile Authentication
o Mobile Banking Registration
o MPIN Change / Reset
o Beneficiary registration / Deletion/Updation
o VPA Portability (Many to many relationships between VPA and accounts)

Following are the transaction supported on RBLPay -

o Push Request (Payment)
o Pull request (Collect)
o Payment via QR code
o Payment via intent call from other sources.
store_info.short_description: Unified Payment Interface App From RBL Bank Limited (RBLPay)
